description: TCPWedge is typically used to collect data from scientific devices, such as sensors and meters, and send the data to applications, such as Microsoft Access or Excel. When you create a device and application configuration, you can save it and reuse it instead of having to create the configuration from scratch again.

To create a TW3 file in WinWedge, select File → New , set the configuration, then select File → Save or Save As... . To open a TW3 file in TCPWedge, select File → Open... . You can also double-click the file if you have the WinWedge suite already installed on your computer. This method automatically opens TCPWedge and loads the configuration.
NOTE: TCPWedge is only available with the WinWedge Professional package.
